verses.verse: In Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> I have <S%H2620>taken<s%> <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> Let me <S%H408>never<s%> <S%H5769><s%> be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
In Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me, and <S%H6403>rescue<s%> me; <S%H5186>Incline<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> to me, and <S%H3467>save<s%> me.

Be Thou to me a <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H4583>habitation,<s%> to which I may <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H935>come;<s%> Thou hast <S%H6680>given<s%> <S%H6680>commandment<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> me, For Thou art my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress.<s%>

<S%H6403>Rescue<s%> me, O my <S%H430>God,<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> Out of the <S%H3709>grasp<s%> of the <S%H5765>wrongdoer<s%> and <S%H9145>ruthless<s%> <S%H9145>man,<s%>
For Thou art my <S%H8615>hope;<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> [Thou art] my <S%H4009>confidence<s%> from my <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

By Thee I have been <S%H5564>sustained<s%> from [my] <S%H990>birth;<s%> Thou art He who <S%H1491>took<s%> me from my mother's <S%H990>womb;<s%> My <S%H8416>praise<s%> is <S%H8548>continually<s%> of Thee.
I have <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H4159>marvel<s%> to <S%H7227>many;<s%> For Thou art my <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H4268>refuge.<s%>
My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with Thy <S%H8416>praise,<s%> And with Thy <S%H8597>glory<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long.
Do not <S%H7993>cast<s%> me <S%H7993>off<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H2209>old<s%> <S%H2209>age;<s%> Do not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me when my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3615>fails.<s%>
For my <S%H340>enemies<s%> have <S%H559>spoken<s%> against me; And those who <S%H8104>watch<s%> for my <S%H5315>life<s%> have <S%H3289>consulted<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%>
<S%H559>Saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> him; <S%H7291>Pursue<s%> and <S%H8610>seize<s%> him, for <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>"
O <S%H430>God,<s%> do not be <S%H7368>far<s%> from me; O my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2363>hasten<s%> to my <S%H5833>help!<s%>

Let those who are <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> [and] <S%H3615>consumed;<s%> Let them be <S%H5844>covered<s%> with <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H3639>dishonor,<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> to <S%H9567>injure<s%> me.
But as for me, I will <S%H3176>hope<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> And will <S%H8416>praise<s%> Thee <S%H3254>yet<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> and <S%H3254>more.<s%>

My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H5608>tell<s%> of Thy <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> [And] of Thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long; For I do not <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H5615>sum<s%> [of them.]

I will <S%H935>come<s%> with the <S%H1369>mighty<s%> <S%H1369>deeds<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God;<s%> I will <S%H2142>make<s%> <S%H2142>mention<s%> of Thy <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> Thine <S%H905>alone.<s%>
O <S%H430>God,<s%> Thou hast <S%H3925>taught<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth;<s%> And I <S%H5704>still<s%> <S%H2008><s%> <S%H5046>declare<s%> Thy <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> <S%H6381>deeds.<s%>

And <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H5704>when<s%> [I am] <S%H2209>old<s%> and <S%H7872>gray,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> do not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me, <S%H5704>Until<s%> I <S%H5046>declare<s%> Thy <S%H2220>strength<s%> to [this] <S%H1755>generation,<s%> Thy <S%H1369>power<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> who are to <S%H935>come.<s%>

For Thy <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> [reaches] to the <S%H4791>heavens,<s%> Thou <S%H834>who<s%> hast <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>things;<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H3644>like<s%> Thee?

Thou, <S%H834>who<s%> hast <S%H7200>shown<s%> me <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H6869>troubles<s%> and <S%H9567>distresses,<s%> Wilt <S%H2421>revive<s%> me <S%H7725>again,<s%> And wilt <S%H5927>bring<s%> me up <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H8415>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
Mayest Thou <S%H7235>increase<s%> my <S%H1420>greatness,<s%> And <S%H5437>turn<s%> [to] <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me.

I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> Thee with a <S%H5035>harp,<s%> [Even] Thy <S%H571>truth,<s%> O my <S%H430>God;<s%> To Thee I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> with the <S%H3658>lyre,<s%> O Thou <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

My <S%H8193>lips<s%> will <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> I <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praises<s%> to Thee; And my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed.<s%>

My <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H1897>utter<s%> Thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long; For they are <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> for they are <S%H2659>humiliated<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H9567>hurt.<s%>
